mapper.update: UPDATE t_config SET module_name = #{moduleName}, entity_name = #{entityName}, section_name = #{sectionName}, config_key = #{configKey}, config_name = #{configName}, config_value = #{configValue}, config_desc = #{configDesc}, config_content = #{configContent}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
